'''''Surveyor of Stone''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoints]] in Liyue (excluding The Chasm).
